Wisdom: أَهْلُ الذِّكْرِ أَهْلُ اللَّهِ وَخَاصَّتُهُ
enWisdom: The People of Remembrance (or followers of the Qur’an) are the People of Allah and His favoured ones

Wisdom: الذِّكْرُ أَفْضَلُ الْغَنِيمَتَيْنِ
enWisdom: Remembering [Allah] is the better of the two gains

Wisdom: الذِّكْرُ لَيْسَ مِنْ مَرَاسِمِ اللِّسَانِ وَلَا مِنْ مَنَاسِمِ الْفِكْرِ وَلَكِنَّهُ أَوَّلٌ مِنَ الْمَذْكُورِ وَثَانٍ مِنَ الذَّاكِرِ
enWisdom: Remembering [Allah] is not from rituals of the tongue nor is it from the passing of thoughts rather it is first from the remembered and then from the rememberer

Wisdom: الْجُلُوسُ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ مِنْ بَعْدِ طُلُوعِ الْفَجْرِ إِلَى حِينِ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ لِلِاشْتِغَالِ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَسْرَعُ فِي تَيْسِيرِ الرِّزْقِ مِنَ الضَّرْبِ فِي أَقْطَارِ الْأَرْضِ
enWisdom: Sitting in the masjid from after dawn up to sunrise in order to remember [and praise] Allah, the Glorified, is quicker in making sustenance [more easily] obtainable than travelling to different parts of the land [in order to earn one’s livelihood]

Wisdom: اذْكُرْ عِنْدَ الظُّلْمِ عَدْلَ اللَّهِ فِيكَ وَعِنْدَ الْقُدْرَةِ قُدْرَةَ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: In times of injustice, remember the justice of Allah with you and when you are powerful, [recall] the power of Allah over you

Wisdom: اشْحَنِ الْخَلْوَةَ بِالذِّكْرِ وَاصْحَبِ النِّعَمَ بِالشُّكْرِ
enWisdom: Fill your solitude with the remembrance [of Allah] and accompany blessings with gratitude

Wisdom: أَفِيضُوا فِي ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ فَإِنَّهُ أَحْسَنُ الذِّكْرِ
enWisdom: Be abundant in your remembrance of Allah, for it is the best remembrance

Wisdom: أَصْلُ صَلَاحِ الْقَلْبِ اشْتِغَالُهُ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The basis of reformation of the heart is occupying it with the remembrance of Allah

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَوْلِيَاءَ اللَّهِ لَأَكْثَرُ النَّاسِ لَهُ ذِكْراً وَأَدْوَمُهُمْ لَهُ شُكْراً وَأَعْظَمُهُمْ عَلَى بَلَائِهِ صَبْراً
enWisdom: Verily the friends of Allah are those who remember Him the most, are constantly grateful to Him and have greater patience in the face of His trials

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلذِّكْرِ أَهْلًا أَخَذُوهُ مِنَ الدُّنْيَا بَدَلًا فَلَمْ تَشْغَلْهُمْ تِجَارَةٌ وَلَا بَيْعٌ عَنْ ذِكْرٍ يَقْطَعُونَ بِهِ أَيَّامَ الْحَيَاةِ وَيَهْتِفُونَ بِهِ فِي آذَانِ الْغَافِلِينَ
enWisdom: Verily there are those who hold on to the remembrance of Allah and have taken it in lieu of this world and thus neither trade nor business has preoccupied them from [His] remembranceThey spend the days of their lives with it and shout it in the ears of the negligent [in order to remind them]

Wisdom: إِذَا رَأَيْتَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُؤْنِسُكَ بِذِكْرِهِ فَقَدْ أَحَبَّكَ
enWisdom: When you see that Allah is making you comfortable with His remembrance, then [know that] He loves you

Wisdom: بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ تُسْتَنْزَلُ الرَّحْمَةُ
enWisdom: It is through the remembrance of Allah that mercy descends

Wisdom: خَيْرُ مَا اسْتُنْجِحَتْ بِهِ الْأُمُورُ ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The best means by which you achieve success in [all] matters is the remembrance of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ مَطْرَدَةُ الشَّيْطَانِ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah is a means of driving away Satan

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ شِيمَةُ الْمُتَّقِينَ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah is the practice of the Near Ones

Wisdom: ذَاكِرُ اللَّهِ مِنَ الْفَائِزِينَ
enWisdom: The one who remembers Allah is from the successful ones

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ سَجِيَّةُ كُلِّ مُحْسِنٍ وَشِيمَةُ كُلِّ مُؤْمِنٍ
enWisdom: Remembering Allah [at all times] is the trait of every good-doer and the quality of every believer

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ طَارِدُ اللَّأْوَاءِ وَالْبُؤْسِ
enWisdom: The remembrance of Allah is a dispeller of hardships (or maladies) and misery

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ دَوَاءُ أَعْلَالِ النُّفُوسِ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah is the cure for the maladies of the souls

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ دِعَامَةُ الْإِيمَانِ وَعِصْمَةٌ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ
enWisdom: The remembrance of Allah is the pillar of faith and a protection against Satan

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ رَأْسُ مَالِ كُلِّ مُؤْمِنٍ وَرِبْحُهُ السَّلَامَةُ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah is the [principal] asset of every believer and its profit is safety against Satan

Wisdom: سَامِعُ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ ذَاكِرٌ
enWisdom: The one who listens to the [remembrance and] glorification of Allah is [himself] a glorifier

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ صَمَتَ إِلَّا مِنْ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who remains silent except from the remembrance of Allah

Wisdom: عَوِّدْ نَفْسَكَ الِاسْتِهْتَارَ [عدم الاستهتار] بِالذِّكْرِ وَالِاسْتِغْفَارِ فَإِنَّهُ يَمْحُو عَنْكَ الْحَوْبَةَ وَيُعَظِّمُ لَكَ الْمَثُوبَةَ
enWisdom: Accustom yourself to being engrossed in remembrance [of Allah] and repentance, for indeed this will wipe out your sin and make your reward great

Wisdom: كُنْ فِي الْمَلَإِ وَقُوراً وَكُنْ فِي الْخَلَاءِ ذَكُوراً
enWisdom: Be solemn when among the people and oft-remembering [of Allah and His bounties] when alone

Wisdom: مَنْ ذَكَرَ اللَّهَ ذَكَرَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever remembers Allah, He remembers him

Wisdom: مَنِ اشْتَغَلَ بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ طَيَّبَ اللَّهُ ذِكْرَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is preoccupied in the remembrance of Allah, Allah makes his remembrance good

Wisdom: لَا تَذْكُرِ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ سَاهِياً وَلَا تَنْسَهُ لَاهِياً وَ اذْكُرْهُ [ذِكْراً] كَامِلًا يُوَافِقُ فِيهِ قَلْبُكَ لِسَانَكَ وَيُطَابِقُ إِضْمَارُكَ إِعْلَانَكَ وَلَنْ تَذْكُرَهُ حَقِيقَةَ الذِّكْرِ حَتَّى تَنْسَى نَفْسَكَ فِي ذِكْرِكَ وَتَفْقُدَهَا فِي أَمْرِكَ
enWisdom: Do not remember Allah, the Glorified, in a state of inattentiveness, and do not forget Him by being distracted [with the amusements of this world], and remember Him perfectly such that your heart is in agreement with your tongue and your inward is in accordance with your outward; and you will never remember Him with the befitting remembrance until you forget your ego in your remembrance and lose it in your affair [because all your attention is towards Allah]
